EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
M/V AFTER YOU IN NEED OF DIESEL FUEL IN
34-35.50S 002-04.22E. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST
IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO CAPE TOWN RADIO,

MRCC CAPE TOWN, TELEX: 511600, FAX: 021 551 3760,
